page.title: 09A GIRL'S DAY:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {A typical day for Katherine.}I am 10, I have a sister aged 12,mum and dad. We live in a{four-bedroomed house}with a big garden. Dad has a{motor-bike}and we have two{cars}owned by my parents. We have a{sailing boat}which dad made himself. We use it at Swanage on holidays. We all have{bikes.}My sister and I have a goldfish each. Mum works from 10a.m. to 3p.m. at Shirehall.A {typical day}for me would be getting up at 7a.m. and having{breakfast}of cornflakes,toast and a drink of orange juice.At 8.30 mum drives me to school. I play before school begins.At {lunchtime}I eat a packed lunch.At 3.30 mum drives me home.We have a drink.Fiona walks home, has a drink then starts her{homework.}Mum cooks tea and I read or watch{television.}At 5.30 dad comes home and we eat at 6p.m.
